wtsproc.config: Side-by-Side Cooling Package Vehicle equipped with air conditioning and transmission oil cooler

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood assembly
Drain cooling system
Disconnect battery to ground cable and disconnect ECM ground
Remove grille assembly
Remove emblem
Remove bumper end supports
Close hood to remove bumper assembly and re-open hood assembly
Remove hood assist shock, support hood, and disconnect both hood tilt assist springs

note.para: Be careful not to over extend hood or damage to hood could occur

step1.para: Remove right side engine splash shield and remove previously disconnected right side hood tilt assisit spring
Disconnect air conditioning condenser and secure out of the way if equipped
Disconnect transmission oil cooler and secure out of the way if equipped
Disconnect surge tank hose from top of radiator and remove fitting to allow top plate removal
Remove right side radiator stay rod mounting bracket with stay rod attached
Disconnect surge tank from radiator frame and secure out of way
Remove engine shroud bolts
Remove top section of radiator core support
Remove left side engine splash shield and remove previously disconnected left side hood tilt assisit spring
Remove sealing section from left side of hood
Disconnect power steering reservoir from radiator frame and secure out of the way
Disconnect left side radiator stay rod and remove stay rod mounting bracket
Disconnect hood wiring harness and ground wire from radiator
Disconnect upper radiator hose from radiator and secure out of the way
Disconnect lower radiator hose from radiator
Remove left side radiator core support side section
Remove radiator core support bolts from center section (between CAC and radiator)
Remove radiator assembly with center support bracket attached
Transfer center support bracket, fitting and ground wire to new radiator assembly
Install radiator assembly with center support bracket attached
Install radiator core support bolts to center section

note.para: DO NOT TIGHHTEN AT THIS TIME

step1.para: Install left side radiator core support side section

note.para: DO NOT TIGHTEN BOLTS AT THIS TIME

step1.para: Install radiator core support top section and tighten all top plate bolts
Tighten radiator core support side plate and center plate bolts
Install engine shroud bolts
Connect upper and lower radiator hoses to radiator
Connect hood wiring harness and connect ground wire to radiator at connector
Install left side stay rod and bracket
Connect power steering reservoir to radiator frame
Install sealing section to left side of hood
Install left side engine splash shield and connect tilt assisit spring
Connect transmission oil cooler to radiator frame if applicable and secure hoses
Connect air conditioning condenser to radiator frame if applicable and secure lines
Connect surge tank to radiator frame
Install right side radiator stay rod and bracket
Install fitting to top of radiator and connect surge tank hose
Install right side engine splash shield and connect tilt assist spring
Install hood assist shock, connect both tilt assist springs and remove support from hood
Fill cooling system
Close hood and install front bumper assembly
Install both bumper end supports
Install emblem to hood
Install grille assembly
Connect battery cables
Remove wheel chocks
